                java.lang.String guestIC)
        Room_vip's Constructor
        Parameters:
        roomId - The room number that the guest is staying
        customerName - The name of guest staying in this room
        bedType - The type of bed this room has
        checkIn - When this guest is checking in
        checkOut - When this guest will be checking out
        pax - The amount of people staying in this room
        roomStatus - The current status of the room
        guestIC - This guest's identity card number
